episode: I'm always sentimental on my daughter's birthday, remembering the day she was born and her childhood years.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm feeling so sentimental right now. It's my daughter's 24th birthday and I'm remembering back to the day she was born.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Those milestones can be bittersweet, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really is bittersweet. And it makes me feel like time has gone by so quickly.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Time flies, doesn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I love looking at all the old pictures and thinking about past memories.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nostalgia can be so warm and fuzzy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I am sentimental about those past years. I wish I had savored them more at the time!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Regret often comes with hindsight, doesn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes... thinking about things I could have done differently.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: The "what ifs" can be tough.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well, it is a happy day for sure, being that it's her birthday, but I find myself always getting so sentimental about past days and experiences.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Birthdays can be emotional triggers, huh?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: How can I deal with it?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Focus on the present, celebrate her now.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: So I should just live in the here and now, you think?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Cherish memories, but stay present.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That's what I'm going to try and do, but it's hard!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's a process, be gentle with yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I guess I just need to change the way I'm thinking about things.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Shift your perspective, new view.
